Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:78#3002#Kalkzak} wanted to see you, . Judging from the smirk, it's because you hurt the argons good!

Best get moving. Don't want to keep Kalkzak waiting.

My favorite soldier!

, the Shariar note the deeds of our allies and enemies, and we forget neither.

This token is a humble gift, but it's given with all the respect the Shariar can muster! Well done!
